channel.title: How do you Portfoward with a broadband connection?
channel.description: I know your suppose to look before you ask but I did do that and the results didnt turn out to good I even searched it and couldent find any help for broadband only wireless.

item.title: How do you Portfoward with a broadband connection?
item.dc:creator: @Nike_PMaster Nike PMaster
item.description:
@Nike_PMaster wrote:

Do you have a router , If you don’t this is all useless. First go to your “cmd” , then type in “ipconfig”. Type the gateway ip into your browser , then for password and user name type in “admin”. Find out more by searching post - Theres a search bar the the top of the forum page , Near the news.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you Portfoward with a broadband connection?

item.title: How do you Portfoward with a broadband connection?
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

No offence but your slow. You can’t port forward your “internet”. You can only portforward a router, or wireless router.
